author: Darrell Etherington
title: FDA now allows treatment of life-threatening COVID-19 cases using blood from patients who have recovered
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has updated its rules around use of experimental treatments for the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic to include use of ‘convalescent plasma,’ in cases where the patient’s life is seriously or immediately threatened. This i…
